alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 25 at 8:32PM EDT until May 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EDT THURSDAY THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents are expected. * WHERE...The beaches of New Jersey and Delaware. * WHEN...From 6:00 AM until 9:00 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore and into deep and dangerous water.
info.instruction: Entering the surf is discouraged. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Do not swim against the current. If possible, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If you are unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth
